author: harsh.ps.2003
content: I have drafted a decent proposal for 2 projects. Itching to talk to the mentors about my approach. I will link them as preliminary work in week0 dev update soon. author: mariohavel
content: EthCC is about meeting people in person, all the research about projects is individual. The fellowship experience is the same for everyone even if you don't attend

author: mariohavel
content: But everyone who is coming to Cannes at the time is invited to EPF Day, no matter whether they are fellow or not!

author: mariohavel
content: You can reach out to me and ask for feedback or directions first. The current input from mentors is the list of project ideas, that's what you can build on
